items.instruction: Check status of all hardware LED indicators
Check server BIOS and apply updates
Check server drivers and apply updates
Check server firmware and apply updates
Check NAS firmware and apply updates
Check SAN firmware and apply updates
Check fabric switch firmware and apply updates
Ensure all connections are securely seated
"Take a 2 minutes video of the servers and devices, that  will show the LED, and cable connection. Good to  review later if there are any issues."
